quote_text: I’ve always believed that America offers opportunities to all who have the industry and will to seize it. Senator Obama believes that too. quote_text: Let there be no reason now for any American to fail to cherish their citizenship in this, the greatest nation on Earth. Senator Obama has achieved a great thing for himself and for his country.

quote_text: These are difficult times for our country, and I pledge to him tonight to do all in my power to help him lead us through the many challenges we face.

quote_text: But that he managed to do so by inspiring the hopes of so many millions of Americans who had once wrongly believed that they had little at stake or little influence in the election of an American president is something I deeply admire and commend him for achieving.

quote_text: Tonight I hold in my heart nothing but love for this country and for all its citizens, whether they supported me or Senator Obama.
